cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.CC, cs.NA. 

The paper discusses infinite secret sharing schemes, which are related to information theory (cs.IT) and combinatorial algorithms (cs.DS). The use of probability theory suggests a connection to discrete mathematics (cs.DM) and computational complexity (cs.CC). Finally, the mention of Hilbert spaces suggests a connection to numerical analysis (cs.NA).
